au.com.systemic.framework.dao
Class BaseDAO

java.lang.Object
  au.com.systemic.framework.dao.BaseDAO

public class BaseDAO
extends java.lang.Object

Programmer: Joerg Huber

Description & Usage
Base class for all DAOs. Every DAO should extend this class which provides some common functionality and definitions.

Example of use
NA

Assumption & Constraints
None

commitAndClose

public void commitAndClose(java.sql.Connection connection)
This method will commit all transactions for this connection and will close it afterwards.

Parameters:
connection - The connection where the commit occurs.

rollbackAndClose

public void rollbackAndClose(java.sql.Connection connection)
This method will roll all transactions for this connection back and will close it afterwards.

Parameters:
connection - The connection where the commit occurs.

closeResultSet

public void closeResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
Convenience Method. Deals with exceptions. This method will close a given result set.

Parameters:
rs - The result set to be closed.
